meanings.definition: The quality of being very beautiful or attractive.
meanings.sent1: Her gorgeousness captivated everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: The sunset displayed a breathtaking gorgeousness.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's gorgeousness made even the grumpiest person smile.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a tapestry of colorful gorgeousness.
meanings.sent5: The actress's gorgeousness on screen was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The state of being extremely pleasing or delightful.
meanings.sent1: The gorgeousness of the melody brought tears to her eyes.
meanings.sent2: The gorgeousness of the surprise party left her speechless.
meanings.sent3: The cake's gorgeousness was almost too much to eat.
meanings.sent4: The gorgeousness of the vacation destination was beyond imagination.
meanings.sent5: The gorgeousness of the book's ending left her feeling content.
